Q_DESC: Following C++ program ask to the user to enter a sentence then ask to enter a word to be delete from the sentence, then display the new sentence after deleting the given word:
TESTCASE_1:
welcome srm university
srm
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The new String after deleting the word:welcome university
TESTCASE_2:
this is string
is
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
The new String after deleting the word:this string
